channel.title: How do i add shops?
channel.description: i know theres alot of tuts on this but my source has 0 shops in it and i have already spawned the npcs and made the shops in shop.cfg but how do i make it so when i talk or trade npc the shop comes up?

item.title: How do i add shops?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

put it under this or something similar looking to this

if(NPCID == 710){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add shops?
item.dc:creator: @znick55 znick55
item.description:
@znick55 wrote:

i get 100 errors when i add

if(NPCID == 1597) { WanneShop = 1; PutNPCCoords = true; }

into

[code=java]case 155:
int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);
int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
faceNPC(NPCSlot);
boolean FishingGo = false;
boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

	switch (NPCID) {

		if(NPCID == 1597) {
		WanneShop = 1;
		PutNPCCoords = true;
	}
		default:
			msgSend("They are not interested in talking right now.");
			break;
	}
		break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add shops?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

if(NPCID == ###) { WanneShop = #; PutNPCCoords = true; }

If you’re talking to an NPC to open the shop, put that under the NPC first click method. If you’re trading them, but it under NPC second click.

Read full topic
